episode.title: FLRA v. Aberdeen Proving Ground, Dept. of Army

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of William H. Rehnquist

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: I have the opinion of the Court to announce in No. 86-1715, Federal Labor Relations Authority versus Aberdeen Proving Ground.
In this case for the reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk today, the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit is unanimously affirmed.
